comment: * Builder for {@link MediaRoute2ProviderInfo media route provider info}.

methods.name: public Builder setUniqueId(@Nullable String packageName, @Nullable String uniqueId)
methods.comment:
* Sets the package name and unique id of the provider info. *

* The unique id is automatically set by * {@link com.android.server.media.MediaRouterService} and used to identify providers. * The id set by {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService} will be ignored. *

* @hide
